pages.heading: Who we are…
content: fromAtoB offers comparision of all methods of transportation
I am a frontend engineer at fromAtoB and responsible for our choice of Vue.js

pages.heading: Why Vue.js?
content: Main candidates where React and Vue.js
Other candidates: Mithril.js or plain JavaScript

pages.heading: Vue.js vs React
content: Achieves the same with much simpler structures

pages.heading: Wait… Mithril?
content: Mithril was developed in 2014(?) by Leo Horie
Fast virtual DOM, Routing, State and Ajax included

pages.heading: Vue.js vs Mithril
content: Mithril uses JavaScript for templates like React
Mithril is much more light weight (8kb gzipped)
Only a library, no nice webpack setups, no Vuefy

pages.heading: So why Vue.js?
content: But everybody seems to be very happy with the decision

pages.heading: What else
content: We set up a bi-weekly meetup: Vue.js // Berlin
We filed bug reports and feature requests
